name: bknd
tagline: A backend platform for building APIs, auth, storage, and event-driven workflows
description: BKND is a developer-focused backend-as-a-service platform for building and deploying APIs, authentication, storage, and event-driven automation. It offers a web UI and self-hosting option for building modern apps.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Complete backend infrastructure for modern applications. Build faster

features.title: REST API
features.description: Create and deploy REST APIs without complex setup. Rapid development

features.title: User Management
features.description: Built-in user management and auth flows. Secure by default

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Integrated storage solution for uploads and media. Simplified file handling

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage your backend through intuitive web interface. Visual control
